Ok so I installed Ubuntu but after reinstalling KSP with steam and then taking the GameData folder from windows to ubuntu I get extreme lag. Even reducing the graphics dosent help at all.

This comes up when I start steam?

OpenGL GLX context is not using direct rendering, which may cause performance problems.

For more information visit https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=9938-EYZB-7457.

Edited December 6, 2014 by montyben101

I dont know if this can help, but Steam needs the lib32 of your graphic card driver. If you use KSP 64 bits and your graphic card driver is installed, this steam error is not really serious.

To help you we need :

- the logs of KSP: read this How-To-Get-Support,

- to know if your driver of your graphic card have been installed (in 32 and 64 bits), what driver you use, the opensource or the proprietary and what is your graphic card.

And for your driver, you can read this: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24529-The-Linux-compatibility-thread!?p=1100740#post1100740 and you can read this too: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BinaryDriverHowto/

Edited December 6, 2014 by Malah
